projectInfo.title: Project: What and Why
projectInfo.info:
We are pleased to introduce a powerful and user-friendly application that combines the functionalities of Postman and GraphiQL. This tool is designed for developers who need flexible and easy-to-use resources for working with APIs.

With our application, you can effortlessly send requests to RESTful and GraphQL APIs, select methods, configure headers, and instantly view responses.

The built-in request history will help you revisit and manage previously executed operations.

Access to the application is secured with authorization and authentication, ensuring a safe working environment.

Use our application to streamline your API work and make the process more convenient and efficient!

team.KirillDesc: Experienced developer focused on creating efficient web applications. Confidently tackles complex problems and helps streamline team processes

team.NastiaDesc: Frontend specialist with a great sense of design and attention to detail. Creates intuitive interfaces and enhances user interactions
